column4: Hello, I'm on ubuntu right now, but the screen resolution is horrible, and I can't change it on preferences, there is no drop down menu, somebody told to go to the xorg.conf but I don't know what to change, what do I have to change?
Where do I type that? Sorry it's my first time
Sorry, but how do you open a "sudo session?"
at the command line, type sudo <thecommandyouwanttorun>
